Q3: What is regression Testing. Is it ? 1 Are tests to ensure that changes do not un-intended behaviour or additional errors. 2 set of activities that ensure that software is correct., a test done by the developer.
Q2: what is alpha testing? 1 a test that is conducted at the developers site by a customer. 2 the correct test for software beginners guide to testing.
Q1: What is beta testing ? 1 a test that is condcuted at one or more customer sites by the end user of the software 2 free product, bored.
